periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3pm and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could be severe. Cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 28 mph, with gusts as high as 48 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 2am. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 59 overnight. Southwest wind 5 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. East northeast wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 52. Northeast wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Cloudy, with a high near 74. East wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. South southeast wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 65. Northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 44. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 53. North northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 36. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 58. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 32. North wind 3 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 55. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 36. East wind around 5 mph.
